<!-- $_nP_r =\frac{n!}{(n-r)!}$ -->

$\binom{n}{r} = _nC_r = \frac{_nP_r}{r!} = \frac{n!}{(n - r)!r!}$

<!-- $\binom{n}{n_1 \ \ n_2 \ \cdots \ \ n_k} = \frac{n!}{n_1! n_2! \cdots n_k!}$ -->

$P(B | A) = \frac{P(A \cap B)}{P(A)}$

$P(B'|A) = 1 - P(B|A)$

Bayes Rule: $P(A|B) = \frac{P(B|A)P(A)}{P(B)}$

$\mu = E(Y) = \sum_{y \in \mathbb{S}}yp(y)$

$\sigma^2 = V(Y) = \sum_{y \in \mathbb{S}}(y - \mu)^2p(y)$\
\

| **Distribution** | **Probability Function** | **Mean** | **Variance** |
|------------------|--------------------------|-----------|---------------|
| **Binomial** | $\binom{n}{y} p^y (1-p)^{n-y}$ | $np$ | $np(1-p)$ |
| **Geometric** | $p(1-p)^{y-1}$ | $\dfrac{1}{p}$ | $\dfrac{1-p}{p^2}$ |
| **Hypergeometric** | $\dfrac{\binom{r}{y}\binom{N-r}{n-y}}{\binom{N}{n}}$ | $\dfrac{nr}{N}$ | $n \left(\dfrac{r}{N}\right)\left(\dfrac{N-r}{N}\right)\left(\dfrac{N-n}{N-1}\right)$ |
| **Poisson** | $\dfrac{\lambda^y e^{-\lambda}}{y!}$ | $\lambda$ | $\lambda$ |
| **Negative Binomial** | $\binom{y-1}{r-1} p^r (1-p)^{y - r}$ | $\dfrac{r}{p}$ | $\dfrac{r(1-p)}{p^2}$ |


**Geometric series:** $\sum_{n=0}^{\infty} ar^n = \frac{a}{1 - r}$

**For geometric random variable**, $P(Y > k) = (1 - p)^k$

**Maclaurin series expansion:** $e^x = \sum_{n = 0}^{\infty} \frac{x^n}{n!}$

**Binomial expansion**: $(a + b)^n = \sum_{y=0}^{n} \binom{n}{y} a^{y} b^{n -y}$
